checks.name: MySQL Replication SQL Running
checks.script: /usr/bin/mysql --vertical --execute 'SHOW SLAVE STATUS' | grep -w Slave_SQL_Running | awk 'END{ if ( NR == 0 ) { print "Is not set replication."; exit 0; } else if ( NR > 0 && $2 == "Yes" ) { print $1$2; exit 0; } else { print $1$2; exit 1; } }'

checks.name: MySQL Replication Lag
checks.script: /usr/bin/mysql --vertical --execute 'SHOW SLAVE STATUS' | grep -w Seconds_Behind_Master | awk 'END{ if ( NR == 0 ) { print "Is not set replication."; exit 0; } else if ( NR > 0 && $2 >= 10 ) { print $1$2; exit 1; } else { print $1$2; exit 0; } }'
